mapper.sql: id, rss_manager_id, title, link, is_read, create_date, update_date
mapper.insert: insert into rss_page_list (id, rss_manager_id, title, link, is_read, create_date, update_date, context) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rssManagerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{link,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isRead,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{context,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update rss_page_list
rss_manager_id = #{rssManagerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
link = #{link,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
is_read = #{isRead,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
context = #{context,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update rss_page_list set rss_manager_id = #{rssManagerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, link = #{link,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_read = #{isRead,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, context = #{context,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update rss_page_list set rss_manager_id = #{rssManagerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, link = #{link,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_read = #{isRead,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
select c.*,rm.name from rss_page_list c left join rss_manager rm on c.rss_manager_id=rm.id
where 1=1
and c.id = #{id}
and c.title like concat ('%', #{title},'%')
and c.link like concat ('%', #{link},'%')
order by name,c.update_date desc
